EmailTemplate.name: System Master_Sales_Email.WWSKO Survey v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to share your feedback- complete the WWSKO survey!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team -
If you haven't responded yet, we ask that you complete the 2014 WWSKO Survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/WWSKO>. We value your input, and want to hear your feedback. It only takes a few minutes and will help us make next year's WWSKO even better!
Best,
The Global Field Ops Team
